Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:32:32
Folder: C18QVDM - planned activity notification building 10 capacitor bank tripped
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C18QVDM_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-29 12:34
Subject: Planned Activity Notification: Building 10 capacitor bank tripped
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be advised that essential electricity power maintenance has been scheduled for the D3 BLDG 10 & 11 due to repeated tripping in the capacitor bank of Building 11. Consequently, LAN and WIFI Services will be unavailable during these maintenance windows. Rest assured, users will be able to resume using services once the maintenance is complete.

 

Maintenance start time: Saturday, AUG 30, 2025, | 12:00 AM GST

Maintenance end time: Saturday, AUG 30, 2025, | 02:00 AM GST

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via One Reach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
